overview: Welcome to the House of Games. If you're brave enough, cum inside! It's the place that dreams are made of, the place we all hope to stumble across, where she realizes her most forbidden fantasies and deepest sexual desires. Kate and Alice work at the Erotic Call Center. One day, Alice leaves to meet a mystery caller and mysteriously vanishes. Kate bravely investigates her friend's disappearance but during her search, she herself is seized by the House of Games, a place where the forbidden fantasies and erotic dreams become reality.
title: House of Games
